LearnerProgram.name: LearnerProgram
LearnerProgram.description: Represents details of a Learning Program Plan that's created for a learner.

CatalogYear.description: The learner's catalog year, which is the year they began studying at the institution.

ClassCohort.description: The name for a group of students working through the same program at a similar pace.

EndDate.description: The date that the learner exited the program.

IsLocked.description: Indicates whether the record is locked (true) or not (false).

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last accessed this record, a record related to this record, or a list view.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last viewed this record or list view. If this value is null, the user might have only accessed this record or list view (LastReferencedDate) but not viewed it.

LearnerAccountId.description: The Account associated with the learner that the Learning Program Plan is assigned to.

LearnerContactId.description: The Contact record for the learner that the Learning Program Plan is assigned to.

LearningProgramPlanId.description: Learning Program Plan thatâ€™s associated with the Learner Program.

MayEdit.description: Indicates whether the record can be edited (true) or not (false).

Name.description: Name of a Learning Program Plan for an individual learner.

OpportunityId.description: The Opportunity associated with the Learner Program.

OwnerId.description: The user who owns this record.

ParentLearnerProgramId.description: The parent learner program associated with the learner program.

StartDate.description: The date that the learner began the program.

Status.description: Status of the learner's participation in the program.
